name: SS Adventure
description:
A fun platforming game, with a bit of shooter in it. (check the controls)

It's a Work In Progress game. Me, the developer, am fully dedicated to this project and all feedback is appreciated. 

The plot is made, but not much is added to the game, but you can see that it's about an adventure.

Updates for the game come every week. 

Thanks for reading, and if you're going to play, then have fun :)

Controls:

Arrows to move. Shift to run. Spacebar to jump. X to shoot.

Here's a Let's Play made by Youtuber Nick Brightside: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C5FPROBPMps

Please send all feedback to -> helder.armando@hotmail.com

26/10/2014 -> Version 1.4.1 is released. Textures will all be remaked.

03/11/2014 -> Version 1.4.2 is released. Much added.
